II. Purpose of Addendum
Eagle Village has decided to merge the license and contract for Eagle Village-
Hainley CI670290161 and Eagle Village-Leppien CI670383652.
III. Methodology
Review of licensing record, contract amendments and discussion with both Program
Office and Division of Child Welfare Licensing.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Eagle Village encompasses a large campus with multiple buildings licensed under
five different child caring institution licenses. Eagle Village requested two licenses;
Hainley and Leppien become one. Both licenses provide the same programming
and are both contracted for general residential care. Combining the licenses would
provide for flexibility in moving youth between the programs to better suit the ever
changing population dynamics.
V. Recommendation
I recommend Hainley CI670290161 license remain open, increasing the capacity
to 27 with both the Hainley house and Leppien house listed on the terms of the
license and closing Leppien CI670383652 license.
